Use an electric mixer to beat the butter: Use an electric mixer to beat the butter and combined sugars in a medium bowl until pale and creamy. Add the egg and egg yolk and beat until well combined. Roll 2 tablespoonsful of mixture into a: Roll 2 tablespoonsful of mixture into a ball. Place on the lined tray and gently flatten. Repeat with remaining dough. Divide the dough into 2 unequal pieces. One piece of dough should be smaller. Take the larger piece and press out into a square shape. Take the smaller piece and roll into a circle. Cut the circle in half.
Take a teaspoon of oil and brush a pizza: Take a teaspoon of oil and brush a pizza stone. Position the dough square on the pizza stone with one point of the square pointing down.
Position the straight side of a dough ha: Position the straight side of a dough half circle along the upper left edge of the square. Place the other half circle along the upper right edge of the square. Press seams together to join.

Use a peeler to cut wide strips of rind: Use a peeler to cut wide strips of rind off the lemon then thinly slice lengthways into long thin strips. Juice the lemon.
